title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 267.5 - Notice by State Tax Commission requiring City of Yonkers earnings tax returns, statements, or the keeping of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 267.5 - Notice by State Tax Commission requiring City of Yonkers earnings tax returns, statements, or the keeping of records

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 14(a) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-111(a)

The State Tax Commission may require any person, by notice
served upon such person, to make such City of Yonkers earnings tax returns, render such statements, furnish such copies of Federal income tax returns and
of Federal audit determinations, or keep such specific records as the State Tax

Commission may deem necessary to verify whether or not such person is complying
or has complied with article 30-B of the Tax Law and article X of the Codes and

Ordinances of the City of Yonkers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
267.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
